description: A great after dinner palate cleanser with its crisp sweet flavour.
keywords: Sorbet,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Pear,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pear Sorbet Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium pears, peeled, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a pot on a medium heat and cook for 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and allow to cool.
Blend all ingredients and then place into a sealable container suitable for freezing. Freeze for up to 4 hours before serving.
